on reading compounds: 壺【コ】hu (ancient Chinese vessel shaped like a vase, usually used to store alcohol)
壺中【コチュウ】inside a jar, coward, timid person
酒壺【サカツボ】sake jar, jar containing alcohol
扁壺【ヘンコ】circular flat stoneware flask
kun reading compounds: 壺【つぼ】jar, pot, vase, dice cup, depression (i.e. the basin of a waterfall), target (when aiming an arrow), (figurative) bull's-eye, key point (of a conversation, etc.), acupuncture point, moxibustion point, nodes on a fingerboard (of a shamisen, etc.)
壷洗い【つぼあらい】individually "washing" a partner's fingers or toes in one's vagina (esp. as a service at a soapland)
肥壺【こえつぼ】chamber pot, jerry
酒壺【さかつぼ】sake jar, jar containing alcohol
